problem.markdown:
>>Which feature in Query Editor should you use to create table headers from one of the rows?<<
( ) Reverse Rows (x) Use First Row As Headers ( ) Use Headers As First Row ( ) Transpose
[explanation] You can use the Use First Row As Headers feature to create table header from the first row of the table. [explanation]
